original: <color=#FFE787>回復時間：</color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(3596)@</color>對前方投擲大量爆裂物，以<color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(3596)@</color><color=#80cc00>武力</color>對敵人造成物理傷害。
text: <color=#FFE787>Response time: </color><color=#ccffcc>$Skill_CD(3596)@</color> Throw a lot of explosives at the front, with <color=#ccffcc>$Skill_Str(3596) @</color><color=#80cc00>Use force</color> to cause physical damage to the enemy.
